mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.f_originalname AS "originalName", a.f_name AS "name", a.f_size AS "size", a.f_type AS "type", a.f_isdown AS "isDown", a.f_url AS "url", a.f_smallurl AS "smallUrl", a.f_server AS "server", a.f_newsid AS "newsId", a.f_downcount AS "downCount", n.f_title AS "news.title"
LEFT JOIN tb_news n ON a.f_newsid = n.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_newsfile( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, f_originalname, f_name, f_size, f_type, f_isdown, f_url, f_smallurl, f_server, f_newsid, f_downcount ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{originalName}, #{name}, #{size}, #{type}, #{isDown}, #{url}, #{smallUrl}, #{server}, #{newsId}, #{downCount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_newsfile SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, f_originalname = #{originalName}, f_name = #{name}, f_size = #{size}, f_type = #{type}, f_isdown = #{isDown}, f_url = #{url}, f_smallurl = #{smallUrl}, f_server = #{server}, f_newsid = #{newsId}, f_downcount = #{downCount} WHERE id = #{id}
